channel.title: Showing inventory when opening interface [PI]

item.title: Showing inventory when opening interface [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:3, topic:439073”][quote author=RegalX link=topic=541775.msg3968889#msg3968889 date=1333988457]

                                c.getOutStream().writeWordA(5292);
                                c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063);

5292 is the bank interface, it’s only logical in my mind that 5063 is the inventory interface. I’m not sure though, you’ll have to see for yourself. I think it is that though, check in-game!
[/quote]

That isn’t it.[/quote]Remove one line of that code and test in-game if the inventory is still forced. If it isn’t move onto another line. If none of them work, look elsewhere. I’d start first with c.getOutStream().createFrame(248);

Read full topic

5292 is the bank interface, it’s only logical in my mind that 5063 is the inventory interface. I’m not sure though, you’ll have to see for yourself. I think it is that though, check in-game![/quote]

item.title: Showing inventory when opening interface [PI]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I was just wondering what code I would use if I want a specific tab to open up when you open an interface. For example, when you open the bank interface with the code:

It shows your inventory. Is it one of these lines?

c.getItems().resetItems(5064); c.getItems().rearrangeBank(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getOutStream().createFrame(248); c.getOutStream().writeWordA(5292); c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063); c.flushOutStream();

Will rep++.

Read full topic
